meanings.sent1: She relaunders her favorite shirt to make sure it's extra clean.
meanings.sent2: After the rain, she relaunders the clothes on the line to remove any dirt.
meanings.sent3: He relaunders his socks so often, they look brand new every time!
meanings.sent4: The river relaunders the pebbles, making them shine in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The diligent cleaner relaunders every piece of fabric until it sparkles.

meanings.definition: A person who washes clothes again.
meanings.sent1: The relaunders at the laundromat always ensures the clothes are spotless.
meanings.sent2: She hired a relaunders to help with the laundry for the big event.
meanings.sent3: The relaunders had a knack for getting out tough stains with ease.
meanings.sent4: She was a true relaunders, taking pride in making clothes look good as new.
meanings.sent5: The relaunders' expertise in laundry made them highly sought after in the community.
